4:
Pass arguments to aText.exe.


Microsoft Store version:

com.trankynam.atext.exe /enable
com.trankynam.atext.exe /disable

com.trankynam.atext.exe /expand tyvm
com.trankynam.atext.exe /expand ec132413-9245-49bb-b2c0-4dfeb14604a1

com.trankynam.atext.exe /delete "Examples & Guide\Basic\email signature"
com.trankynam.atext.exe /delete "email signature"
com.trankynam.atext.exe /delete "ced39120-9155-4f2a-99e4-097b22b900ff"
com.trankynam.atext.exe /delete "Examples & Guide\Basic\email signature" "email signature" "ced39120-9155-4f2a-99e4-097b22b900ff"

com.trankynam.atext.exe /import "R:\File1.csv" "R:\File2.csv" 
com.trankynam.atext.exe /import "R:\File1.csv" "R:\File2.csv" /to "Examples & Guide\Basic"
com.trankynam.atext.exe /import "R:\File1.csv" "R:\File2.csv" /to "Basic"
com.trankynam.atext.exe /import "R:\File1.csv" "R:\File2.csv" /to "ec132413-9245-49bb-b2c0-4dfeb14604a1"


Non-Microsoft Store version:
Use full path to aText.exe instead of alias com.trankynam.atext.exe

For example:
"%localappdata%\Tran Ky Nam\aText\aText.exe"  /enable
